meanings.definition: People who reconsider their beliefs or opinions.
meanings.sent1: The group of rethinkers gathered to discuss their differing viewpoints.
meanings.sent2: The rethinkers met regularly to talk about their changing ideas.
meanings.sent3: The rethinkers joked about how they always end up changing their minds.
meanings.sent4: She was a true rethnker, always open to new ways of thinking.
meanings.sent5: The room buzzed with energy as the rethinkers debated their beliefs.

meanings.definition: A group of individuals who analyze and reassess their thoughts.
meanings.sent1: At the meeting, the rethinkers shared their insights on various topics.
meanings.sent2: The rethinkers worked together to understand different perspectives.
meanings.sent3: The rethinkers playfully argued about the best approach to thinking.
meanings.sent4: He stood out as a leader among the group of rethinkers.
meanings.sent5: Their discussions were always lively and engaging, typical of a group of rethinkers.

meanings.definition: Those who review and revise their perspectives.
meanings.sent1: The team of rethinkers carefully examined each idea before making decisions.
meanings.sent2: Rethinkers often challenge traditional ways of thinking.
meanings.sent3: The rethinkers laughed as they realized they all had similar new perspectives.
meanings.sent4: She admired the courage of the rethinkers to question the status quo.
meanings.sent5: In the world of business, successful leaders are often seen as rethinkers.
